snippet.title: The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack is coming to Steam!
This collection brings together the Flash classics: FPA World 1 (including the Remaster +  Remix), World 2, World 3, and Fancy Snowboarding.
While we hope this will be the definitive way to experience these games. But don't worry, free options through services like Flashpoint will remain available.

Add it to you Wishlist now! ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1668460/The_Fancy_Pants_Adventures_Classic_Pack/
If the game sells well, it is our hope to enhance this pack by adding other remasters!
